events.message: I reported a collision involving my car and another vehicle last night, needing urgent processing.
Claim has been categorized successfully under the Auto Accident cluster based on the description.
An agent has been assigned to your auto accident claim for further handling and assistance.
Your claim has been acknowledged and is currently under review by the assigned claims specialist.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driverâ€™s license as requested.
All requested documents including photos of the car and police report have been uploaded successfully.
Our claims investigation team has commenced detailed review of the auto accident incident.
Investigation into the collision details and damage assessment has been completed without issue.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on the repair estimate provided by the mechanic.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated quick handling.
Your claim has been approved formally and payment processing will begin shortly for repairs.
The payment for the approved auto accident claim has been successfully issued to your bank account.
This auto accident claim file has now been closed following full payment and customer confirmation.
All auto accident claim records have been archived per internal data retention policies.
